SELECT pc.id as id, pgpt.params_name as paramsName, pgpt.params_code as paramsCode, pgpt.params_type as paramsType, group_concat(pgpv.params_value) as paramsValue FROM platform_case pc JOIN platform_case_classification_params pccp ON pc.id = pccp.case_id JOIN platform_goods_params_term pgpt ON pccp.params_id = pgpt.params_id JOIN platform_goods_params_value pgpv ON pgpv.params_parent_id = pgpt.id WHERE pc.case_code = #{caseCode} GROUP BY pgpt.params_code

SELECT case_code AS caseCode, case_name AS caseName, case_status AS caseStatus, pgc.assortment_name AS assortmentName FROM platform_case pc LEFT JOIN platform_goods_classification pgc ON pgc.id = pc.classification_id WHERE pc.case_status != 0 AND pgc.`status` != 0
AND ( pc.case_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') OR pc.case_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') )

SELECT pc.case_code AS caseCode, pc.case_name AS caseName, pc.case_status AS status, CONCAT( pgc1.assortment_name, '-', pgc2.assortment_name, '-', pgc3.assortment_name ) AS classificationName, pc.create_time AS createTime, pu.user_name AS userName FROM platform_case pc LEFT JOIN platform_user pu ON pu.user_code = pc.creator LEFT JOIN platform_goods_classification pgc3 ON pc.classification_id = pgc3.id LEFT JOIN platform_goods_classification pgc2 ON pgc3.assortment_parent_code = pgc2.assortment_code LEFT JOIN platform_goods_classification pgc1 ON pgc2.assortment_parent_code = pgc1.assortment_code
and pc.case_status = #{status} and (pc.case_code = #{param} or pc.case_name = #{param})
ORDER BY pc.create_time desc
